title: Shiseido Sun Oil
medium: Photo offset lithography on white wove paper
description: On a white ground, tiny images of sunbathers in different positions and densely packed to resemble a crowded beach. At lower center, a squat yellow bottle with orange fluted top.  At center of bottle, a circular depiction on sun rays in orange with the name of the client in orange capitals.  In lower right quadrant, a white arrow in perspective superimposed on bathers and pointing to the bottle.  Inside the arrow, a series of Japanese characters in black.
name: Poster
